short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides ads on learncpp.com.  Use if your adblocker removes the ads, but leaves the large ad container elements.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes the ad container elements on learncpp.com. If your ad blocker leaves the big, empty ad containers on the learncpp.com website, this will fix that.
